title: K-Edge teases first aftermarket computer mount for new Wahoo BOLT w/ 2.0 Aero Mount
content:
Leave it to the accessory mounting wizards at K-Edge to be on the ball when it comes to new computer mounts. Just a few hours after we posted the news of Wahoo’s newest GPS computer with a color screen, K-Edge let us know that a new mount was already in the works. Since the new […]

The post K-Edge teases first aftermarket computer mount for new Wahoo BOLT w/ 2.0 Aero Mount appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
